scripts.predev: docker-compose --project-name hni-toi ps | grep -q 'hni-toi' || (echo 'Docker Compose project is not running' && exit 1)
scripts.install:all: NODE_ENV=development npm i && concurrently --names "global,nextjs,strapi,gateway" -c "bgWhite.black.bold,bgBlack.white.bold,bgMagenta.white.bold,bgRed.white.bold"  "npm install" "npm run install:nextjs" "npm run install:strapi" "npm run install:gateway"
scripts.clean:workspaces: NODE_ENV=development concurrently --names "nextjs,strapi,gateway,global" -c "bgWhite.black.bold,bgBlack.white.bold,bgMagenta.white.bold,bgRed.white.bold" "npm run clean:nextjs" "npm run clean:strapi" "npm run clean:gateway" "npm run clean"
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development concurrently --names "nextjs,strapi,graphql,gateway" -c "bgWhite.black.bold,bgBlack.white.bold,bgMagenta.white.bold,bgRed.white.bold" --kill-others "wait-on http://localhost:1337 && npm run dev:nextjs" "npm run dev:strapi" "wait-on http://localhost:5000 && npm run graphql:codegen:watch" "npm run dev:gateway"
scripts.graphql:codegen: wait-on http://localhost:1337/_health && cd nextjs && npm run codegen
